reviewText: If you love crazy animé you will love this! Tailor goes in to the army just to meet lovely chicks... and he's an complete failure as a soldier. But when a accident happens he becomes a captain... This is really great  and so funny! Tailor has his own style and personality... either you love  him or hate him, nothing in between. This serie can hold you in front of  your TV for a very long time.
